question: Which among the following is incorrect regarding Buland darwaja?
option1: It was built by Akbar in 1602
option2: It was built in Fatehpur Sikri
option3: It was built to commemorate Akbarâ€™s victory on Gujarat only
explanation: Buland Darwaza, or the "Door of victory", was built in 1602 A.D. by Mughal emperor Akbar to commemorate his victory over Gujarat. It is the main entrance to the Jama Masjid at Fatehpur Sikri.
